name: A. Marks
statement:
Vasya, or Mr. Vasily Petrov is a dean of a department in a local
university. After the winter exams he got his hands on a group’s
gradebook.Overall the group has students. They received marks for
subjects. Each student got a mark from to (inclusive) for each
subject.Let’s consider a student the , if there is no student who got a
higher mark for this subject. Let’s consider a student , if there exists
a subject he is the .Your task is to find the number of students in the
group.
